nodes.text: The Knights swoop gang were a group of swoop racers that were adamantly opposed to the Galactic Empire and lead by Finegan Flint. The organization was also enemies of the much more destructive Skulls. They were named for the Jedi Order and attempted to live by a code of honor that separated them from most swoop Gangs. They had more difficulty evading Imperial authorities than the Skulls due to their unwillingness to risk innocent lives.
